intro.p: For each of the following series, use the Divergence, Alternating Summation or Integral test to determine if the series converges.

outtro.p:
\displaystyle \sum_{n=1}^\infty {{Sequence}} converges by the {{Test}} test.
\displaystyle \sum_{n=1}^\infty {{Sequence}} diverges by the {{Test}} test.
